name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE!!!】3D新衣装お披露目!! ゲストと歌って踊って生誕祭♪♪♪【hololive⧸宝鐘マリン】 [wF_VmniNI2I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Seishoujo Ryouiki' by Ali Project.
MC section between Aki Rosenthal and Houshou Marine, discussing the performance and future collaborations.
Performance of the song 'Eh? Ah, Oh.' (え？あぁ、そう。) by Papiyon.

subtitles.original: ハバタケルノナラ...
subtitles.english: If I could take flight...

subtitles.original: 粉々に砕いてほしいわ
subtitles.english: I want you to crush me to pieces

subtitles.original: 地に堕たぬ病い
subtitles.english: An illness that won't fall to the earth

subtitles.original: 心臓にはポワゾン
subtitles.english: A poison in the heart

subtitles.original: 侵されながらも
subtitles.english: While being invaded

subtitles.original: 一頻り祝福されたし
subtitles.english: I have been blessed for a time

subtitles.original: 泣いたのは嗚咽、紅い砂丘
subtitles.english: What cried was a sob, a red sand dune

subtitles.original: 恋するのは墜とすため
subtitles.english: Falling in love is for the sake of falling

subtitles.original: 毒を食みどのアマイ
subtitles.english: Eating poison, which sweet...

subtitles.original: あぁ Darling 抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Oh Darling, hold me tight

subtitles.original: 素肌の絹の光沢で
subtitles.english: With the luster of the silk of bare skin

subtitles.original: 恍惚しちゃう時間を頂戴
subtitles.english: Give me time to be entranced

subtitles.original: あぁ 身体は避けて
subtitles.english: Ah, avoid the body

subtitles.original: 天国での再会の片割れ
subtitles.english: The counterpart of a reunion in heaven

subtitles.original: あぁ ふたりは迷子
subtitles.english: Ah, the two are lost

subtitles.original: 至極の善と魅惑の奈落
subtitles.english: The ultimate good and the enchanting abyss

subtitles.original: 約束の地は何処か其処か
subtitles.english: Where is the promised land, here or there?

subtitles.original: 夢か現か
subtitles.english: Is it a dream or reality?

subtitles.original: さぁ 疾く 此処 揺らして
subtitles.english: Now, quickly, shake here

subtitles.original: 全貌を迎えましょう
subtitles.english: Let us welcome the whole picture

subtitles.original: あぁ Darling 目を開けて
subtitles.english: Oh Darling, open your eyes

subtitles.original: この世の悪の毒窟も 蝕めない
subtitles.english: Even the poisonous den of this world's evil cannot erode it

subtitles.original: 心を頂戴
subtitles.english: Give me your heart

subtitles.original: 卑下もしない
subtitles.english: I won't even humble myself

subtitles.original: 幽閉の蒼白の王子よ 私が女神
subtitles.english: O imprisoned pale prince, I am the goddess

subtitles.original: あぁ Darling 声上げて
subtitles.english: Oh Darling, raise your voice

subtitles.original: このいま刺し違えるほど
subtitles.english: So much so that we stab each other right now

subtitles.original: 大事なものが欲しいのなら
subtitles.english: If you want something important

subtitles.original: 祈りは果てて
subtitles.english: Prayers have ended

subtitles.original: 牢獄で昇天の姫君
subtitles.english: O princess ascending in prison

subtitles.original: あなたが王
subtitles.english: You are the king

subtitles.original: 組まれた指と懺悔の首と
subtitles.english: With clasped fingers and a repentant neck

subtitles.original: 購う罪は何れか其れか
subtitles.english: Which sin is the one to be atoned for?

subtitles.original: 嘘か真か
subtitles.english: Is it a lie or the truth?

subtitles.original: アキロゼ先輩〜！
subtitles.english: Akirose-senpai~!

subtitles.original: よいしょ〜！
subtitles.english: Yoisho~!

subtitles.original: はあ〜！
subtitles.english: Haa~!

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌うの、これ初めてじゃないですか？
subtitles.english: Isn't this the first time we've sung together?

subtitles.original: そうだね！何でさ、この曲選んでくれたん？
subtitles.english: That's right! Why did you choose this song?

subtitles.original: 船長の中では、アキロゼ先輩といえば、もうALI PROJECTのイメージなんですよ！
subtitles.english: In my mind, Akirose-senpai definitely has an ALI PROJECT image!

subtitles.original: あ、そうなんだ！嬉しいな〜！
subtitles.english: Oh, is that so! I'm so happy~!

subtitles.original: 逆に、逆にアキロゼ先輩は...
subtitles.english: Conversely, Akirose-senpai...

subtitles.original: いいよいいよ、いいリズムだね (笑)
subtitles.english: It's fine, it's a good rhythm (laughs)

subtitles.original: アキロゼ先輩は、船長と歌うなら、何がいいと思いますか？
subtitles.english: Akirose-senpai, if you were to sing with me, what would you like?

subtitles.original: マリンちゃんのあの、昭和歌謡とか、めちゃ好きだからな〜。
subtitles.english: Since I really like Marin-chan's Showa-era pop songs and stuff.

subtitles.original: あ〜！ちょっと昭和系の歌歌いたいんだよね！
subtitles.english: Ah! I do want to sing some Showa-style songs!

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃいいじゃないですか！
subtitles.english: That sounds great!

subtitles.original: あの、キャンディーズとか。
subtitles.english: Like Candies.

subtitles.original: お、年下の男の子！？
subtitles.english: Oh, Toshishita no Otokoko!?

subtitles.original: 真っ赤なリンゴ、頬ばるリンゴ...
subtitles.english: A bright red apple, an apple to munch on...

subtitles.original: めっちゃいい！じゃあ次は絶対、「年下の男の子」一緒に歌いましょうね！
subtitles.english: That's great! Then next time, let's definitely sing 'Toshishita no Otokoko' together!

subtitles.original: いいね！じゃあ次は「年下の男の子」で会いましょう！
subtitles.english: Sounds good! Then let's meet next time with 'Toshishita no Otokoko'!

subtitles.original: じゃーねー！
subtitles.english: See ya!

subtitles.original: おめでとねー！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: 建前だけの感情論で
subtitles.english: With an emotional theory that's just a facade

subtitles.original: 全てを量ろうなんて
subtitles.english: Trying to measure everything

subtitles.original: そんなのはお門違い、笑わせないでよね
subtitles.english: That's totally wrong, don't make me laugh

subtitles.original: だけどたまには楽しいことも
subtitles.english: But sometimes, even fun things

subtitles.original: 必要だと思いの
subtitles.english: I think are necessary

subtitles.original: 気が済むまで私も、満足したいわ
subtitles.english: Until I'm satisfied, I want to be fulfilled too

subtitles.original: あぁ 目の前から消えていった
subtitles.english: Ah, it disappeared from before my eyes

subtitles.original: 心を刺す嘘みたいに
subtitles.english: Like a lie that stabs the heart

subtitles.original: ぐるぐるって混ざるような、この感じがたまらない
subtitles.english: This feeling of swirling and mixing is irresistible

subtitles.original: ねぇ ぶっ飛んじゃうのが良いなら
subtitles.english: Hey, if getting blown away is fine

subtitles.original: 私をもっと本気にさせて
subtitles.english: Then make me more serious

subtitles.original: 逃げるなんて許さないわ
subtitles.english: I won't forgive you for running away

subtitles.original: やっぱりそんな態度なのね
subtitles.english: Just as I thought, that's your attitude

subtitles.original: やっぱりそんな態度なのかしら
subtitles.english: I wonder if that's really your attitude

subtitles.original: 甘いのもいいと思うけれど
subtitles.english: I think sweet things are good too, but

subtitles.original: 苦いのも嫌いじゃない
subtitles.english: I don't dislike bitter things either

subtitles.original: そんな私のことを、わがままだと言うの？
subtitles.english: Are you calling me selfish for that?

subtitles.original: 馬鹿だとかアホらしいとか
subtitles.english: Like being a fool or being ridiculous

subtitles.original: 言いたいだけ言えばいいわ
subtitles.english: Just say whatever you want

subtitles.original: 他人の価値観なんて、私は知らないの
subtitles.english: I don't know anything about other people's values

subtitles.original: あぁ 掌から落ちていった
subtitles.english: Ah, it fell from the palm of my hand

subtitles.original: 紫色の花みたいに
subtitles.english: Like a purple flower

subtitles.original: くるくるって踊るような、この感じがたまらない
subtitles.english: This feeling of dancing round and round is irresistible
